name: Ooze, Scintillating
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, prone

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Pseudopod and three Weapon Thrashes.

actions.name: Weapon Thrash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d4+5) bludgeoning damage/P/S (the ooze's choice) damage.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (2d4+5) bludgeoning damage + 18 (4d8) acid.

reactions.name: Shed Oozling
reactions.desc: When it has more than 10 hp and is subjected to acid cold lightning or slashing it can lose 10 hp to create an oozling: same stats as scintillating ooze except it is Tiny has 10 hp can't make Weapon Thrashes and can't use this reaction or legendary actions.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.desc: Up to its speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Grasping Pseudopod
legendary_actions.desc: Launches a pseudopod at one creature it can see within 30' of it. Target must make DC 17 Str save or be pulled up to 30' toward the ooze.

legendary_actions.name: Lunging Attack (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Makes one Weapon Thrash attack at a creature it can see within 10 ft. of it.

special_abilities.name: Amorphous
special_abilities.desc: Move through space 1ft.+ wide with o squeezing.

special_abilities.name: Corrosive Form
special_abilities.desc: A creature that touches it or hits it with melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 10 (3d6) acid.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: Difficult surfaces even ceilings no ability check.
